name: Project: SYN - Combat System [BA Project]
description:
This is a combat system, designed and developed as the project part of the bachelors thesis 'Constands and Variables - the Anatomy of Combat Design in Video Games', written by Nikolas Joshua Klein.

The project has been created in the Game Design Track at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences and has been supervised by Prof. Florian Berger and Prof. Bernd Diemer.

For further information, please contact: the@nikolasjklein.com
